title: Access your files, anywhere
body: The ability to use a smartphone, tablet or a computer to access your account means your files follow you everywhere.

title: Security you can trust
body: 2-factor and user-controlled encryption are just a couple of the security features we allow to help secure your files.

title: Real-time collaboration
body: Securely share files and folders with friends, family and co-workers for live collaboration. No email attachments required.

title: Store any type of file
body: Whether you're sharing holidays photos or work documents, Fylo has you coveres allowing for all file types yo be securely stored and shared.
